ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Cannot delete repo through the API
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I can GET the repo using the API request and it seems to work fine. However, using the DELETE method it outputs the following stack trace: ``` 2015/09/13 16:26:22 http: panic serving 80.200.141.199:53109: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix UICore CSS import ordering problem by dynamically import app.css (#1208)
